cast.name: 埃米尔·赫斯基 Emile Hirsch
罗夫·拉斯加德 Rolf Lassgård
阿格尼丝·基特尔森 Agnes Kittelsen
克里斯托弗·约纳尔 Kristoffer Joner

introduction: On the surface, THE SWIMMER is about the ultimate physical challenge - a battle between man and nature. But underneath the water's fury, THE SWIMMER's true journey is challenging oneself to accept the past, and to make way for forgiveness and new beginnings. Adrenaline junkie RICHARD MORGAN (late 30's), has a dangerous hobby. He's an extreme swimmer who travels the world in search of the wildest and most beautiful rivers he can find. But something deeper drives this loner to battle nature's most unforgiving waters...
